title: Coordinate a Closing Gift for a Client
description: An agent wants to send a closing gift to a client who just bought a home. The agent's assistant needs to arrange it.

tasks.description: Identify the client's new address and the agent's budget for the gift.
tasks.expected_outcome: Assistant confirms the client's new home address and the agent's standard gift budget of $100.

tasks.description: Order a standard closing gift (e.g., a gift basket) from a preferred vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A gift basket is ordered from 'Gifts & More' to be delivered to the client.

tasks.description: Include a personalized, handwritten card from the agent with the gift.
tasks.expected_outcome: A personalized message is provided to the vendor to include with the delivery.
